creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: multiple scenes: man in Chinese dress with 3 attendants sitting behind red table looks at gold paper before him, while two demon-like creatures look on; ogre runs towards devilish figure at center who stands next to room with man in red praying to Amida; at R, Buddha with Bodhisattvas surrounded by orange tinted clouds with small figure in red at LR; text border
inscription:

text inscription on border (?)
markings: Japanese inscription on L side when rolled
object_name: Hanging scroll, originally fragments mounted on a handscroll
title: Sketches (shukuzu)
